checkAvailability

public boolean checkAvailability(java.util.Date start,
                                 java.util.Date end)
Checks if the room is free for the given dates. Iterates through all the habitations, to check if one of them is occupying the room between the given dates.

Parameters:
start - The start of the duration
end - The end of the duration
Returns:
True if the room is free for the given duration, otherwise false
